name: AMERICAN FEDERATION FOR CHILDREN, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Educate Dept. of Education and TX Education Agency regarding policy alternatives for special needs students.
Settlement agreement between the USDOE and the Texas Education Agency to create an ongoing payment mechanism for certain special education students in Texas.
